name: Studio Ghibli Habit Tracker
description: Track your habits and stay motivated!I've been working about this for a while, and I wanted to share it with you.It's "Diary & Habits" Notion Template, and it's going to help you keep track of all the little things that make you who you are.I was inspired to create this habit tracker because I wanted to take some of the magic of Studio Ghibli and put it on Notion. This habit tracker is a simple tool that helps you keep track of your habits and mood in one place. It makes tracking habits fun
features: Habit tracker with 4 options and progress bars. (7 options in plus version); Day, week, month and year (2023) review of your habits' stats.; Gratitude Diary, daily affirmation and more.; Mood tracker with 7 different moods. (Plus version).; Review your mood through the year (Plus version).; Can I personalize my template?Sure! Feel free to make any changes.; Still, have questions?No worries! Email me with any issues or questions atjotasuarezm@gmail.comor via Twitter @jotasuarezm.; Habit tracker con 4 opciones y barras de progreso. (7 opciones en versi√≥n plus)
